name: Peasant Bandit
whenAllyDiesReminder: [Necrophage Stench:] All creatures within 5 feet must make a DC 8 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned.
whenEnemyDiesReminder: [Mob Mentality:] The bandit gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls for each remaining ally alive. If it was frightened, the condition is removed.

passives.name: Weak Willed
passives.description: When an ally dies in the bandit's presence, it must succeed on a Wisdom DC 5 saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. It may use an action to roll the saving throw again each turn, freeing itself of the condition on a success. Each successive saving throw's DC is higher by 1, and the bandit doesn't become immune to this condition after it's been freed from it.

passives.name: Mob Mentality
passives.description: When an enemy dies in the bandit's presence, the bandit's attack rolls and damage rolls have a +1 for each remaining ally alive. Also, if it was frightened, the condition is removed.

actions.name: Pitchfork
actions.description: Melee  Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Club
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:   +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit:  4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
